headline: FirstEnergy (FE) Q3 Earnings and Revenues Surpass Estimates
summary: FirstEnergy (FE) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +9.21% and +5.84%, respectively, for the quarter ended September 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: FirstEnergy (FE) Q3 Earnings and Revenues Surpass Estimates
raw.summary: FirstEnergy (FE) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +9.21% and +5.84%, respectively, for the quarter ended September 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: FirstEnergy: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The results exceeded Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of four analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of 76 cents per share. The utility company posted revenue of $4.15 billion in the period, also exceeding Street forecasts.

raw.headline: FirstEnergy: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: The results exceeded Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of four analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of 76 cents per share. The utility company posted revenue of $4.15 billion in the period, also exceeding Street forecasts.

headline: FirstEnergy Announces Third Quarter 2025 Financial Results
summary: FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE) today reported third quarter 2025 GAAP earnings of $441 million, or $0.76 per basic and diluted share, on revenue of $4.1 billion. This compares to third quarter 2024 GAAP earnings of $419 million, or $0.73 per basic and diluted share, on revenue of $3.7 billion. GAAP results include the impact of special items listed in the table below.

headline: Investing in Power Grid Reliability for Toledo Edison Families and Businesses in Northwest Ohio
summary: A major reliability project is transforming electric service in Fulton County, delivering stronger, more resilient power to thousands of residents and businesses in the greater Toledo area, including customers of Toledo Edison, a FirstEnergy (NYSE: FE) electric company.
